description: This course builds on the concepts and components of Modern Dance I and II. Open to majors and other students with instructor's permission. Prerequisite: DANCE 210/DANCE 211 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered each semester. May be repeated eight times with permission of instructor.
name: Modern III
prerequisites: Prerequisite: DANCE 210/DANCE 211 (at least twice) and/or permission of the instructor. Offered each semester. May be repeated eight times with permission of instructor.
